actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of child's insurance benefits, without regard to certain requirements otherwise applicable, in the case of adopted children who were born after their adopting parents became entitled to old-age or disability insurance benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for the payment of child's insurance benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) without regard to specified requirements otherwise applicable, in the case of adopted children who were born after their adopting parents became entitled to old-age or disability insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of child's insurance benefits, without regard to certain requirements otherwise applicable, in the case of adopted children who were born after their adopting parents became entitled to old-age or disability insurance benefits.
